mapper.select: select l.*, date_format(l.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') fmtdate, categoryName from links l, categories c where l.user = #{user} and c.categoryId = l.categoryId order by linkId desc
select *, date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') fmtdate from links where linkId = #{linkId}
mapper.insert: insert into links(categoryId, user, linkName, link, regdate) values(#{categoryId}, #{user}, #{linkName}, #{link}, now())
mapper.update: update links set categoryId=#{categoryId}, linkName = #{linkName}, link = #{link} where linkId = #{linkId}
